==Trivia==
{{NorseMyth|name=Þökk|was a female giant who refused to cry at Baldr's funeral, thus preventing his revival and dooming him to Helheim. Afterwards, the mourners reasoned that Thökk was actually Loki in disguise.}}
* Prior to October 26th, 2018, [[Thökk Skill Description Correction (Notification)|Thökk's description]] was inconsistent with its in-game effect.
